regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode is active at any time, preventing simultaneous operation of normal, training, and maintenance modes.
The TCS shall ensure that no two modes (normal, training, maintenance) of the Operations State run simultaneously.

regen.absent_element: simultaneous running prohibition of the modes
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall ensure that normal operations mode, training operations mode, and maintenance operations mode do not run simultaneously while in the Operations State.

label: The Operations State modes shall not exist concurrently.
absence: action of prohibiting multiple modes from running simultaneously
